name: openparkdeveloper
short_description:
taking over for the failed tpb3d game openparkdeveloper has taken its place as they closed down the tpd3d build due to lack of interest from lack of accomplishment.
currantly we have a couple people working on code and a couple of people working on ride and coaster modeling for the game the ui is in the works also.
we are still in need of expirienced coders animators and modelers with low poly high detailed rides buildings scenery and other amenities for a theme park senario if your interested go to openparkdeveloper.com and either post on a forum subject and or keep an eye on the irc website. webchat,freenode,net
summary: is an open source comunity working on a themepark game
